description:
Now, this is not a doom and gloom lecture. Actually it is a talk about what is going to happen in the next 30 years. It is a talk about what is called "postcapitalism". It is a talk about how almost all jobs are going to disappear due to automation. But also how we are going to think about this and come up with solutions.

Its a talk about the three big challenges we need to face. And yes, this involves you as well!

A totally different aspect from TED: David Autor: Why are there still so many jobs?
